refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the sampling-rate of a stored function table.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the sampling-rate of a stored function table.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: Returns the sampling-rate of a GEN01 generated table. The sampling-rate is determined from the header of the original file. If the original file has no header or the table was not created by these GEN01, ftsr returns 0. New in Csound version 3.49.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
